Package io.wcm.caconfig.editor

Interface PathBrowserRootPathProvider

  • @ConsumerType
public interface PathBrowserRootPathProvider
    Allows to provide a dynamic root path for path browser widget. Implement as OSGi service and set a service property PROPERTY_SELECTOR which is used to reference the implementation in the context-aware configuration property metadata options.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_SELECTOR
      Name of OSGi property to distinguish different implementations of the provider.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      @Nullable java.lang.String getRootPath​(@NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource contextResource)
      Get dynamic root path for pathbrowser widget in the context-aware configuration editor.

    • Field Detail

      • PROPERTY_SELECTOR

        static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_SELECTOR
        Name of OSGi property to distinguish different implementations of the provider. The value that this property is set to has to be configured in the Context-Aware configuration property metadata using EditorProperties.PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH_PROVIDER.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getRootPath

        @Nullable
@Nullable java.lang.String getRootPath​(@NotNull
                                       @NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource contextResource)
        Get dynamic root path for pathbrowser widget in the context-aware configuration editor.
        Parameters:
        contextResource - Context resource. This is usually the AEM page of the configuration editor
        Returns:
        Root path or null
